- SonarQube Community Edition – Multi-language static analysis and code quality/security gates.[1][2]
- Semgrep – Fast, rule-based static analysis for 30+ languages, easy custom rules.[3][4]
- CodeQL – GitHub’s semantic code analysis engine with deep vulnerability queries.[5][6]

- eslint-plugin-security-rules – Additional security-focused ESLint ruleset.[13]
- NodeJsScan – Static security code scanner built for Node.)
